ISSUE.TITLE: When installing nopCommerce and selecting Norwegian, the language sets to NO-NN, which is wrong. It should be NB-NO
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When installing nopCommerce and selecting Norwegian, the language sets to NO-NN, which is wrong. It should be NB-NO Let's check https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1 Also ensure that a valid language pack is installed in this case

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6476 Match URL path and breadcrumbs on a product page

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6470 Changed culture info for Norwegian language
